name: SourceURIsSelector
description: Selects links aimed at URIs with the '/Source?something' query
content:
<head><meta http-equiv="content-type" content="text/html" charset="ISO-8859-1">
      <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=9">
      <link rel="stylesheet" href="resources/jquery/jquery-ui-1.11.2/jquery-ui.min.css">
      <link rel="stylesheet" href="resources/font-awesome-4.2.0/css/font-awesome.min.css">
	<title>Simple Search</title>
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="/mains/Source?type=styles&name=calendar&OWASP_CSRFTOKEN=SF9G5KUQtaApOaGCZghUlImzCkSgP4Y9razopBLk4iEa">
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="/mains/Source?type=styles&name=style&OWASP_CSRFTOKEN=SF9G5KUQtaApOaGCZghUlImzCkSgP4Y9razopBLk4iEa">
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="/mains/Source?type=styles&name=asc/calendar&OWASP_CSRFTOKEN=SF9G5KUQtaApOaGCZghUlImzCkSgP4Y9razopBLk4iEa">
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="/mains/Source?type=styles&name=asc/style&OWASP_CSRFTOKEN=SF9G5KUQtaApOaGCZghUlImzCkSgP4Y9razopBLk4iEa">

<script src="resources/ckeditor/ckeditor.js" type="text/javascript"></script><style>.cke{visibility:hidden;}</style>
<script src="resources/jquery/jquery-ui-1.11.2/external/jquery/jquery.js"></script>
<script src="resources/jquery/jquery-ui-1.11.2/jquery-ui.min.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="resources/jquery/jquery-cookie-1.4.1.js"></script>

<script type="text/javascript">
var DOMable=(document.getElementById) ? true : false;

var baseColor="HTML_MenuBaseColor";
var overColor="HTML_MenuOverColor";
var selectedColor="HTML_MenuSelectedColor";

var selected="Search.Simple";
var tagOver="";

/** Call to get if using a mobile device; prevents repeatedly running getIsMobile function below */
var isMobile;

/** Iterator. Run function 'action' on each item in array 'array'. */
var forEach = function (array, action) {
	for (var b = 0; b < array.length; b++) {
		action(array[b]);
	}
};

/**
 *  Returns true if the current user is accessing CMS on a mobile device; false if not.
 *  Use variable isMobile below to avoid repeatedly calling this function.
 */
var getIsMobile = function () {
	var mobileDevices = [
		/ipad/gi, /iphone/gi, /android/gi, /blackberry/gi, /symbian/gi, /iemobile/gi, /zune/gi,
		/mobi/gi, /phone/gi, /nokia/gi, /webos/gi, /kindle/gi, /palmsource/gi, /opera mini/gi,
		/dorothy/gi, /fennec/gi, /avantgo/gi, /iris/gi, /mot.*midp/gi, /hiptop/gi, /compal/gi
	];

	var isMobileDevice = false;

	forEach(mobileDevices, function (device) {
		isMobileDevice = ((navigator.userAgent.match(device) !== null) ? true : isMobileDevice);
	});

	return isMobileDevice;
};

isMobile = getIsMobile();

function mOver(src,menuItem,menuItemDesc,tag) {
  tagOver=tag;

  if (DOMable) {
    src.style.cursor="hand";
  }

  window.status=menuItemDesc;

  if (menuItem != selected) {
    src.id=overColor;
  }
}

function mOut(src,menuItem) {
  tagOver="";

  if (DOMable) {
    src.style.cursor="default";
  }

  window.status="";

  if (menuItem != selected) {
    src.id=baseColor;
  }
}

function canChangePageInMenu() {
  // allow local overrides
  if (window.canChangePageLocal) {
    return canChangePageLocal();
  }

  if (window.isChanged && isChanged()) {
    var
